failure.description: Queue split packets to send at a timed interval on a separate thread

success.description: Send split packets out per frame without a queued thread

network.split_packets.net_queued_packet_.name: Queued packet thread
network.split_packets.net_queued_packet_.description: Whether to queue split packets on another thread

network.split_packets.net_splitrate.description: How many packets to split per frame

sound.killsound.tf_dingalingaling_lasthi.name: Killsounds
sound.killsound.tf_dingalingaling_lasthi.description: Whether to play a sound every time you kill an enemy.

sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.name: High damage killsound pitch
sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.description: Pitch of the killsound for hits of at least 150 damage.

sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.name: Low damage killsound pitch
sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.description: Pitch of the killsound for hits of at most 10 damage.

sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.name: Killsound pitch override
sound.killsound.tf_dingaling_lasthit_pit.description: Whether to force one pitch for all killsounds, regardless of damage.

sound.hitsound.tf_dingalingaling.name: Hitsounds
sound.hitsound.tf_dingalingaling.description: Whether to play a sound every time you do damage.

sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitchmaxdmg.name: High damage hitsound pitch
sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitchmaxdmg.description: Pitch of the hitsound for hits of at least 150 damage.

sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitchmindmg.name: Low damage hitsound pitch
sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitchmindmg.description: Pitch of the hitsound for hits of at most 10 damage.

sound.hitsound.tf_dingalingaling_repeat_.name: Hitsound repeat delay
sound.hitsound.tf_dingalingaling_repeat_.description: Minimum delay in seconds between two hitsounds.

sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitch_overri.name: Hitsound pitch override
sound.hitsound.tf_dingaling_pitch_overri.description: Whether to force one pitch for all hitsounds, regardless of damage.

success.description: Mix sounds in a separate thread. Performance impact on systems with less than 4 threads.

failure.description: Mix sounds in the main thread. Performance impact on systems with 4 threads or more.

sound.snd_mix_async.name: Asynchronous sound mixing
sound.snd_mix_async.description: Whether to use a separate thread for sound mixing.

sound.phonemedelay.TODO: isnt this technically rendering, not sound?
sound.phonemedelay.name: Phoneme delay
sound.phonemedelay.description: How many seconds to reserve for sound processing before before moving characters' mouths.

sound.snd_delay_sound_shift.name: Sound delay
sound.snd_delay_sound_shift.description: How many seconds to reserve for sound processing before playing the sound. Low values will significantly impact sound quality. High values cause delay.

sound.snd_mixahead.name: Sound mix-ahead buffer size
sound.snd_mixahead.description: How many seconds of sound to mix to the sound buffer every time sound is mixed.

values.description: Use the configuration reported by the operating system.

sound.config.snd_surround_speakers.name: Speaker configuration
sound.config.snd_surround_speakers.description: What speaker configuration to assume when computing sound spatialization.

sound.snd_lockpartial.name: Sound partial locking
sound.snd_lockpartial.description: Whether to use an interleaved partial-locking algorithm for scheduling sound.

values.description: Only play the most recent instance of every sound.
Allow playing as many instances of every sound as otherwise possible.

sound.snd_cull_duplicates.name: Duplicate sounds
sound.snd_cull_duplicates.description: Whether to allow playing multiple instances of the same sound.

sound.voice_steal.name: Voice steal mode
sound.voice_steal.description: Whether to allow reusing a channel occupied by a quiet far-away sound.

sound.voice_buffer_ms.name: Voice buffer size
sound.voice_buffer_ms.description: Size of the voice chat sound buffer. Higher values increase latency. Low values may cause sound stuttering.

debug.sound.snd_async_spew_blocking.name: Asynchronous sound blocks spew
debug.sound.snd_async_spew_blocking.description: Print to console wherever asynchronous sound blocks on file I/O.

values.description: Enable sound ducking. Used by voice chat. Performance impact.

sound.snd_disable_mixer_duck.name: Sound ducking
sound.snd_disable_mixer_duck.description: Whether to allow sound ducking - prioritizing a sound by lowering the volume of all other sound.

values.description: Enable sound ducking. Used by voice chat. Performance impact.

sound.snd_disable_mixer_duck.name: Sound ducking
sound.snd_disable_mixer_duck.description: Whether to allow sound ducking - prioritizing a sound by lowering the volume of all other sound.

sound.dsp.dsp_slow_cpu.name: Expensive sound effects
sound.dsp.dsp_slow_cpu.description: Whether to avoid cpu-intensive spatial sound effects.

values.description: Spatialize only `1/2^x` of all channels every frame.

sound.spat.snd_spatialize_roundrobin.name: Sound channel spatialization fraction
sound.spat.snd_spatialize_roundrobin.description: How many sound channels to spatialize each frame.

values.description: Do not use a sound effect to simulate size of the surroundings.

values.TODO 1: are there any other values? is this a toggle or an effect id?
values.TODO: is this accurate? isnt this overridden by the automatic mechanisms and soundscapes?

sound.dsp.dsp_room.name: Room sound effect
sound.dsp.dsp_room.description: What effect to use to simulate sound distortion due to room size.

values.description: Do not use a sound effect when facing away.
Use a low-pass effect for sounds when facing away.
Use a low-pass effect and a 80ms delay for sounds when facing away.

sound.dsp.dsp_facingaway.name: Face-away sound effect
sound.dsp.dsp_facingaway.description: What effect to use to when facing away from the sound source.

values.description: Do not use a sound effect for the administrator.

sound.dsp.dsp_speaker.name: Administrator sound effect
sound.dsp.dsp_speaker.TODO: is it used by anything else?
sound.dsp.dsp_speaker.description: What sound effect to use to simulate low-quality speakers. Used by the administrator.

values.description: Do not use a sound effect underwater.
Use a water effect with a small sound delay.
Use a water effect with a medium sound delay.
Use a water effect with a large sound delay

sound.dsp.dsp_water.name: Water sound effect
sound.dsp.dsp_water.description: What sound effect to use when underwater.

values.description: Do not use a spatial sound effect.
Use the default spatial sound effect.

sound.dsp.dsp_spatial.name: Spatial sound effect
sound.dsp.dsp_spatial.description: What effect to use for simulating spatial sound delays.

values.description: Spatialize on the next frame. Increases spatialization latency.

sound.spatial.snd_defer_trace.name: Defer sound spatialization
sound.spatial.snd_defer_trace.description: Whether to wait until the next frame to spatialize a sound.

values.description: Only refill the sound buffer once.
Additionally refill the sound buffer after time-consuming operations.

sound.snd_noextraupdate.name: Extra sound update
sound.snd_noextraupdate.description: Whether to refill the sound buffer multiple times per frame.

failure.description: Do not use averaged framerate for key-press duration tracking.

success.description: Use averaged framerate for key-press duration tracking.

keyboard_look.cl_yawspeed.name: Keyboard look yaw speed
keyboard_look.cl_yawspeed.description: How fast the looking direction is changed by the keyboard look on the yaw (left-right) axis.

keyboard_look.cl_pitchspeed.name: Keyboard look pitch speed
keyboard_look.cl_pitchspeed.description: How fast the looking direction is changed by the keyboard look on the pitch (up-down) axis.

values.description: Simply capture the mouse. Use unless there are problems.
Try to work around issues with mouse capturing. Might help prevent clicking outside the TF2 window.

mouse.m_limitedcapture_workaround.name: Mouse capture issues workarounds
mouse.m_limitedcapture_workaround.description: Whether to work around mouse capture issues.

values.description: Take the average of the change in mouse position changes over 2 frames. Makes mouse input smoother if FPS varies a lot.
Try to disable acceleration, filtering and any other effects applied to mouse input by the system. Does not completely work on Mac OS.
Use mouse input processed by the operating system.

mouse.m_rawinput.name: Raw mouse input
mouse.m_rawinput.description: Whether to use raw mouse input.

values.description: Accelerate by `min(m_customaccel_max, pow(raw_mouse_delta, m_customaccel_exponent) * m_customaccel_scale + sensitivity)`.
TODO is it m_yaw for x and m_pitch for y or the other way
values.descirption_: Custom mouse acceleration scaled on the x and y axes by `m_yaw` and `m_pitch` respectively.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_scale.name: Custom mouse acceleration multiplier
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_scale.description: Value used in custom mouse acceleration formulas as a coefficient. For example, a value of `0.5` would halve the amount of acceleration.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_max.name: Custom mouse acceleration upper limit
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_max.description: Maximum value of the custom mouse acceleration.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_exponent.name: Custom mouse acceleration exponent
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_exponent.description: Value used in custom mouse acceleration formulas as an exponent. Small changes effect the acceleration by a lot.

steam_controller.sc_pitch_sensitivity.name: Steam controller extra pitch sensitivity
steam_controller.sc_pitch_sensitivity.description: Additional sensitivity for the pitch (up-down) axis of the steam controller.

steam_controller.sc_yaw_sensitivity.name: Steam controller extra yaw sensitivity
steam_controller.sc_yaw_sensitivity.description: Additional sensitivity for the yaw (left-right) axis of the steam controller.

go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_fast_fol.name: Go-kart camera fast follow speed
go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_fast_fol.description: Speed with which the camera follows a player in a go-kart when they are moving fast.

go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_slow_fol.name: Go-kart camera slow follow speed
go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_slow_fol.description: Speed with which the camera follows a player in a go-kart when they are moving slowly.

console.filter.con_filter_text_out.name: Console message blacklist
console.filter.con_filter_text_out.description: Filter out console messages containing a given string. Used to block console spam.
